title: Immortal's Spring
description: [Book 3 of The Chrysomelia Stories, following Persephone's Orchard and Underworld's Daughter...]Sophie Darrow said yes once to a young man offering a realm of Greek gods and immortality. Now her home has been shattered, and her friends and family pulled along with her as they run from an evil cult and take shelter in the gloomy Underworld. But remembering the life of the original immortals long ago--Persephone, Hades, Hekate, Hermes, and more--may be their key to victory, as well as happiness. In ancient times too, the murderous cult Thanatos attacked and destroyed nearly all the Greek immortals who sought to bring good to humankind. But those immortals planted seeds in both their realm and ours to ensure their season would someday bloom again. And spring is finally coming.[Content warnings: grief, death, some instances of violence, one instance of natural disaster.]
author: Molly Ringle
